title: #337:  Window Shade
description:
Major drama on "Below Deck" this week: the windows are dirty!!! Listen as we discuss Captain Lee losing his mind over reefs, anchors, and salty residue. Then we cover Bravo's laughably bad HGTV knock-off, "Yours, Mine, or Ours" and wrap up with some "Million Dollar Listing LA." Plus, Crappens Mailbag and a raffle!

00:04:01 - Crappens Mailbag
00:22:10 - Below Deck
01:04:30 - Yours, Mine, or Ours
01:23:23 - Million Dollar Listing LA
01:46:57 - Raffle Results!!

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
